title: Star Wars: The Hero's Journey on Screen
description: One-minute skill: Star Wars: The Hero's Journey on Screen.

hook.text: George Lucas read a mythology book and used it as a blueprint. Star Wars followed Joseph Campbell's hero's journey.

discovery.text: He applied Campbell's 'monomyth' structure: the call to adventure, the mentor, the ordeal, and the return.

twist.text: Studios rejected the script repeatedly. Only 20th Century Fox took the risk â€” and it changed cinema forever.

punchline.text: The biggest film of the century followed the oldest story formula on Earth.
